column4: Can anyone help me? I'm trying to install Quake 4, and it's wanting me to copy files from the CDs to a folder, but when I try to paste the files or copy them, it's telling me that I don't have permission to move things to that folder.
All I Want to be able to do is copy files from my cd to a folder, but it's not letting me because it's saying I don't have permission, this can't be THAT difficult to troubleshoot.
